text: Bermuda Affair is a 1956 American adventure drama movie directed by A. Edward Sutherland. It stars Gary Merrill, Kim Hunter and Ron Randell. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1956 adventure movies Category:1956 drama movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American drama movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Bermuda Category:Movies directed by A. Edward Sutherland
title: Bermuda Affair
